bio: I know I might look serious all the time, but honestly, I’m just a chill guy who loves good food, great conversations, and a solid gym session.
At work, I thrive in a team—I keep an open mind, love brainstorming ideas, and enjoy making things happen with a great group of people.
If you find me at the bar, I’ll be the one starting conversations and making sure everyone’s having a good time.
And if you bring up tech, gaming, or anything nerdy, prepare for a deep dive.
Outside of work, I’m either in the gym or in the kitchen, experimenting with new recipes.

positions.title: CAD Drafter / Project Manager
achievements: Orchestrated complex initiatives from project inception to completion, ensuring quality execution within scope, budget, and schedule for $4 million projects.
Developed comprehensive project plans, managed risks, and allocated resources to meet or exceed project benchmarks of $20,000,000 worth of projects.
Led and empowered teams of 6-12 members, prioritizing communication and collaboration to achieve high-quality performance.
Mastered Agile project management tools, streamlining workflows and reducing labor costs by 10%.
Outperformed financial targets by a 10% margin and mitigated a potential $200,000 cost increase.
Translated design concepts into precise technical drawings and detailed plans, ensuring accuracy and compliance.
Managed all Autodesk licenses for the drafting department, eliminating workflow redundancies.
Increased team productivity by 300% by implementing the latest CAD technologies and techniques.
Collaborated closely with project managers to integrate waterproofing elements seamlessly into designs.
